translation: Formerly the śramaṇa Zhu Fahou of Dunhuang translated the True Lotus Sutra at the imperial court in the Jin dynasty.

translation: Yao Xing of the Later Qin asked Rāṣṭrapāla to translate the Lotus of the Marvelous Dharma.

translation: I'll test the two translations, but they mustn't be one book.

translation: The guard resembles the leaves of a palm tree, and the chest resembles the words of a tortoise.

source_sentence: 余撿經藏，備見二本，多羅則與《正法》符會，龜茲則共《妙法》允同，
translation: I searched the collection of scriptures and found two complete copies. The Tārāyaṇa is consistent with the Mahasamdhinirmocana Sastra, while the Kauṣṭhila is in accord with the Mahasamdhinirmocana Sastra.

source_sentence: 護葉尚有所遺，什文寧無其漏？
translation: What's the legacy of preserving leaves that Kumārajīva doesn't leave behind?

source_sentence: 而護所闕者，《普門品》偈也；
translation: Protecting what is lacking is a verse of the Universal Chapter.

source_sentence: 什所闕者，《藥草喻品》之半，《富樓那》及《法師》等二品之初，《提婆達多品》、《普門品》偈也。
translation: Kumārajīva's missing is the first half of the Medicine and Herbs Parable Chapter, the first half of the second half of the two chapters of Puruṇa and Dharma Master, as well as the verses Devadatta Chapter and Samantabhadra Chapter.

source_sentence: 什又移《囑累》在《藥王》之前，二本陀羅尼並置《普門》之後。
translation: Kumārajīva also moved the Sutra of Entrustment to be placed before the Master of Healing, and two copies of the dhāraṇī were placed after the Universal Gate.

source_sentence: 其間異同，言不能極。
translation: The differences between them are the same, but they can't be expressed in words.

source_sentence: 竊見《提婆達多》及《普門品》偈，先賢續出，補闕流行。
translation: I respectfully see that the stanzas of Devadatta and Samantabhadra, as well as the verses of Samantabhadra. The ancient sages continued to compose them in order to make up for the shortcomings [in the collection] and circulate them widely.

source_sentence: 余景仰遺風，憲章成範，大隋仁壽元年辛酉之歲，因普曜寺沙門上行所請，
translation: In the first year of the reign of Emperor Mañjuśrī, at the age of Xinyu in the first year of the Renshou era (557 C.E.) of the Great Sui dynasty, he was invited by the monk Shangxing of Puyao Monastery.

source_sentence: 遂共三藏崛多、笈多二法師，於大興善寺重勘天竺多羅葉本，《富樓那》及《法師》等二品之初勘本猶闕，
translation: Together with the Masters Gupta and Gupta of the Tripitaka Master, they compiled a copy of the Indian version of the palm tree scripture at Daxingshan Monastery. The first copies of the two fascicles of the Pūrṇa and Dharma Master texts are still missing.

source_sentence: 《藥草喻品》更益其半，《提婆達多》通入《塔品》，《陀羅尼》次《神力》之後，
translation: The Metaphorical Chapter on Healing Herbs and Herbs adds another half to the text, while Devadatta enters into the Pagoda Chapter. After the Dhāraṇī of the Dhāraṇī of the Teaching, there is the Mahasamghika Sastra.

source_sentence: 《囑累》還結其終。
translation: The Entrustment still concludes with its end.

source_sentence: 字句差殊，頗亦改正，儻有披尋，幸勿疑惑。
translation: The words and phrases are different, but it's quite possible to correct them, so please don't doubt it.

source_sentence: 雖千萬億偈，妙義難盡，而二十七品，本文且具。
translation: Although there are thousands of myriads of koṭis of verses whose subtle meanings are difficult to exhaust, the twenty-seven chapters are all contained in this text.

source_sentence: 所願四辯梵詞，遍神州之域；
translation: My wish is that the four kinds of eloquence, in Sanskrit, pervade all the domains of the celestial realm.

source_sentence: 一乘祕教，悟象運之機。

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時佛住王舍城耆闍崛山中，與大比丘眾萬二千人俱，皆是阿羅漢，
translation: Thus I have heard: One time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha, in the mountainous region of Gṛdhrakūṭa, accompanied by a great assembly of twelve thousand bhikṣus, all arhats.

source_sentence: 諸漏已盡，無復煩惱，逮得己利盡諸有結，心得自在，其名曰：阿若憍陳如、摩訶迦葉、優樓頻螺迦葉、伽耶迦葉、那提迦葉、舍利弗、大目乾連、摩訶迦旃延、阿[少\/兔]樓馱、劫賓那、憍梵波提、離婆多、畢陵伽婆蹉、薄拘羅、摩訶拘絺羅、難陀、孫陀羅難陀、富樓那彌多羅尼子、須菩提、阿難、羅睺羅，
translation: Having extinguished the defilements, they no longer have any afflictions. They attain self-reliance and annihilate all fetters of existence for their own benefit. Their minds attain mastery. These beings are called Ājñātakauṇḍinya, Mahākāśyapa, Uruvilvākāśyapa, Gayā kāśyapa, Na

source_sentence: 如是眾所知識，大阿羅漢等。
translation: Thus, these are the great arhats and so forth who are known by everyone.

source_sentence: 復有學、無學二千人。
translation: There were also two thousand people who had more to learn and those who did not.

source_sentence: 摩訶波闍波提比丘尼，與眷屬六千人俱。
translation: The Mahāprajāpatī bhikṣuṇī was accompanied by 6,000 members of his retinue.

source_sentence: 羅睺羅母耶輸陀羅比丘尼，亦與眷屬俱。
translation: Rāhula's mother Yaśodharā, the monk and nun, were also accompanied by their retinues.

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩八萬人，皆於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提不退轉，皆得陀羅尼，樂說辯才，
translation: “Great enlightening beings, eighty thousand in number, never regressed from unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment. They all attained mental command and were delighted to expound eloquence.

source_sentence: 轉不退轉法輪。
translation: He turns the irreversible wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 供養無量百千諸佛，於諸佛所，殖眾德本，常為諸佛之所稱歎。
translation: They honored innumerable hundreds of thousands of buddhas, planted roots of virtue in the presence of those buddhas, and were always praised by those buddhas.

source_sentence: 以慈修身，善入佛慧。
translation: He cultivates his body with kindness and skillfully enters the Buddha's wisdom.

source_sentence: 通達大智到於彼岸。
translation: He comprehends great wisdom and reaches the other shore.

source_sentence: 名稱普聞無量世界，能度無數百千眾生。
translation: His name was widely heard in measureless worlds, and he was able to save countless hundreds of thousands of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 其名曰：文殊師利菩薩、觀世音菩薩、得大勢菩薩、常精進菩薩、不休息菩薩、寶掌菩薩、藥王菩薩、勇施菩薩、寶月菩薩、月光菩薩、滿月菩薩、大力菩薩、無量力菩薩、越三界菩薩、跋陀婆羅菩薩、彌勒菩薩、寶積菩薩、導師菩薩、如是等菩薩摩訶薩八萬人俱。
translation: They were called Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva, Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva, Mahāprajāpatī Bodhisattva, Great Power Bodhisattva, Bodhisattva who had attained great momentum, eternally zealous Bodhisattva, Unceasing Bodhisattva, Jewel Palm Bodhisattva, King of Healing Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 爾時釋提桓因，與其眷屬二萬天子俱。
translation: At the time, Śakra Devānām-Indra and his retinue of 20,000 celestial beings were there.

source_sentence: 復有名月天子、普香天子、寶光天子、四大天王，與其眷屬萬天子俱；
translation: There were also the moon deities, the universally fragrant deities, the jewel light deities, and the four great celestial kings, together with their retinues of ten thousand deities.

source_sentence: 自在天子、大自在天子，與其眷屬三萬天子俱；
translation: The thirty thousand celestial beings in the assembly, including the great celestial beings Maheśvara and Maheśvara, were accompanied by their retinues.

source_sentence: 娑婆世界主梵天王——尸棄大梵、光明大梵等，與其眷屬萬二千天子俱。
translation: Brahmā, the lord of the sahā world, the great Brahmā Śikhin, the great Brahmā radiant, and so forth, were accompanied by 12,000 celestial beings who belonged to their retinues.

source_sentence: 有八龍王，難陀龍王、跋難陀龍王、娑伽羅龍王、和脩吉龍王、德叉迦龍王、阿那婆達多龍王、摩那斯龍王、漚鉢羅龍王等，
translation: There were eight dragon kings, namely, the nāga king Nanda, the nāga king Upananda, the nāga king Sāgara, the nāga king Vasiṣṭha, the nāga king Takshaka, the nāga king Anavatapta, the nāga king Manas, the nāga king Nirmāṇarati, and the nāga king Tuṣita.

source_sentence: 各與若干百千眷屬俱。
translation: Each of them was accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of followers.

source_sentence: 有四緊那羅王，法緊那羅王、妙法緊那羅王、大法緊那羅王、持法緊那羅王，
translation: There were four kings of the kiṃnaras: Dharma king, Dharma king, Wonderful Dharma king, Great Dharma king, and Dharma upholder king.

source_sentence: 各與若干百千眷屬俱。
translation: Each of them was accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of followers.

source_sentence: 有四乾闥婆王，樂乾闥婆王、樂音乾闥婆王、美乾闥婆王、美音乾闥婆王，
translation: And there were four kings of the gandharvas, namely, Lokeśvara (the king of the gandharvas), Mahadeva (the king of the gandharvas), Maheśvara (the king of the gandharvas), Maheśvara (the king of the gandharvas), and Maheśvara (the king of the gandharvas).

source_sentence: 各與若干百千眷屬俱。
translation: Each of them was accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of followers.

source_sentence: 有四阿脩羅王，婆稚阿脩羅王、佉羅騫馱阿脩羅王、毘摩質多羅阿脩羅王、羅睺阿脩羅王，
translation: There were four asura kings: the asura king Bhadrika, the asura king Uttaragupta, the asura king Vimalacitra, and the asura king Rāhu.

source_sentence: 各與若干百千眷屬俱。
translation: Each of them was accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of followers.

source_sentence: 有四迦樓羅王，大威德迦樓羅王、大身迦樓羅王、大滿迦樓羅王、如意迦樓羅王，
translation: There were four garuda kings: the great majestic garuda king, the great bodily garuda king, the great adorned garuda king, and the wish-granting garuda king.

source_sentence: 各與若干百千眷屬俱。
translation: Each of them was accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of followers.

source_sentence: 韋提希子阿闍世王，與若干百千眷屬俱，各禮佛足退坐一面。
translation: King Ajātaśatru of Vaideśeṣika, accompanied by several hundreds of thousands of his retinues, each bowed at the Buddha's feet and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊，四眾圍遶，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚歎，為諸菩薩說大乘經，
translation: At that time the World-honored One, surrounded by the fourfold assembly, offered them homage, venerated, and praised him. He taught the Mahayana scriptures to the bodhisattvas:

source_sentence: 名《無量義教菩薩法佛所護念》。
translation: It's called the mindfulness protected by the bodhisattvas of the Dharma and buddhas of the teaching of immeasurable meaning.

source_sentence: 佛說此經已，結加趺坐，入於無量義處三昧，身心不動。
translation: After the Buddha had taught this sūtra, he sat cross-legged and entered concentration in the immeasurable meaningful place, his body and mind unmoving.

source_sentence: 是時天雨曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華、曼殊沙華、摩訶曼殊沙華，而散佛上及諸大眾，
translation: It then rained heavenly flowers such as maṇḍala flowers, mahāmandārava flowers, mañjūṣaka flowers, and mahāmanjūṣaka flowers all scattered over the Buddha and the great assembly.

source_sentence: 普佛世界六種振動。
translation: The world of the universal buddhas is shaken in six ways.

source_sentence: 爾時會中，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，
translation: At the time, there were monks, nuns, laymen, laymen, laymen, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and so forth.

source_sentence: 及諸小王、轉輪聖王，是諸大眾得未曾有，歡喜合掌一心觀佛。
translation: And the lesser kings and wheel-turning sage kings, these great multitudes attain unprecedentedness, rejoicing as they join their palms in joy and singlemindedly contemplate the Buddha.

source_sentence: 爾時佛放眉間白毫相光，照東方萬八千世界靡不周遍，下至阿鼻地獄，
translation: It was then that the Buddha emitted a ray of light from the white hair between his eyebrows, illuminating all the eighty-eight thousand worlds in the east and descending down to Avīci Hell.

source_sentence: 上至阿迦膩吒天，於此世界，盡見彼土六趣眾生；
translation: In this world they see all sentient beings in the six realms of rebirth.

source_sentence: 又見彼土現在諸佛，及聞諸佛所說經法；
translation: They also saw the buddhas of that land and heard the teachings of scriptures taught by those buddhas.

source_sentence: 并見彼諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷諸修行得道者；
translation: They also saw the bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen and laywomen who had attained enlightenment.

source_sentence: 復見諸菩薩摩訶薩，種種因緣、種種信解、種種相貌行菩薩道；
translation: They also saw great enlightening beings practicing the path of enlightening beings by various causes and conditions, various beliefs and understandings, various appearances and characteristics.

source_sentence: 復見諸佛般涅槃者；
translation: He also saw the buddhas enter final nirvana.

source_sentence: 復見諸佛般涅槃後，以佛舍利起七寶塔。
translation: He also saw that after the parinirvāṇa of the buddhas, he built a seven-jeweled stūpa with the Buddha's relics.

source_sentence: 爾時彌勒菩薩作是念：「今者世尊現神變相，以何因緣而有此瑞？
translation: At the time, Maitreya thought, Now that the Bhagavān is manifesting miraculous signs, what are the causes and conditions for this apparition?

source_sentence: 今佛世尊入于三昧，是不可思議現希有事，當以問誰？
translation: Now that the Bhagavān has entered samādhi, this is an inconceivable and rare thing to see. To whom should I ask?

source_sentence: 誰能答者？」
translation: Who can answer?

source_sentence: 復作此念：「是文殊師利，法王之子，已曾親近供養過去無量諸佛，必應見此希有之相，
translation: Again, he thought: This is Mañjuśrī, the son of the King of the Dharma. He has been intimate with and honored innumerable buddhas of the past.

source_sentence: 我今當問。」
translation: Now, I will ask questions.

source_sentence: 爾時比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，及諸天龍鬼神等，咸作此念：「是佛光明神通之相，
translation: It was then that the monks, bhikṣuṇīs, laymen, laymen, and laywomen, as well as gods, dragons, ghosts, and other deities thought:

source_sentence: 今當問誰？」
translation: Who will I ask now?

source_sentence: 爾時彌勒菩薩欲自決疑，又觀四眾比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷及諸天、龍、鬼神等眾會之心，
translation: It was then that Maitreya, wanting to resolve his doubts, also observed the minds of the fourfold assembly of monks, nuns, laymen, and laymen, gods, dragons, ghosts, and other spirits.

source_sentence: 而問文殊師利言：「以何因緣，而有此瑞神通之相，放大光明照於東方萬八千土，
translation: Mañjuśrī asked Mañjuśrī, “Through what cause and condition did this miraculous sign emanate such a ray of light that it shone brightly over one thousand eighteen thousand worlds in the east?

source_sentence: 悉見彼佛國界莊嚴？」
translation: Do you see all the adornments of that Buddha's land?

source_sentence: 「文殊師利！　　導師何故，　　眉間白毫，
translation: “O Mañjuśrī, why does the Guide put his white hair between his eyebrows?

source_sentence: 大光普照？　　雨曼陀羅、　　曼殊沙華，
translation: The great ray of light shone everywhere, raining the maṇḍala and the mañjūṣaka flowers.

source_sentence: 栴檀香風，　　悅可眾心。　　以是因緣，
translation: The wind of sandalwood fragrance pleases the minds of all beings.

source_sentence: 地皆嚴淨；　　而此世界，　　六種震動。
translation: The earth is all beautiful and pure, yet this world shakes in six ways.

source_sentence: 時四部眾，　　咸皆歡喜，　　身意快然，
translation: The fourfold assembly was greatly delighted, Both body and mind blissful.

source_sentence: 得未曾有。　　眉間光明，　　照于東方，
translation: He attained an unprecedented ray of light Between his eyebrows, Illumining the east.

source_sentence: 萬八千土，　　皆如金色。　　從阿鼻獄，
translation: All the eighty-eight thousand lands are like a golden color.

source_sentence: 上至有頂，　　諸世界中，　　六道眾生，
translation: Up to the summit of existence, In all worlds, Sentient beings in the six realms of rebirth.

source_sentence: 生死所趣，　　善惡業緣，　　受報好醜，
translation: The courses of birth and death have good and bad karmic conditions as their objects, and the rewards they receive are good and bad.

source_sentence: 於此悉見。　　又覩諸佛，　　聖主師子；
translation: Here they see them all. They also see the buddhas, The holy lords and lions.

source_sentence: 演說經典，　　微妙第一。　　其聲清淨，
translation: He expounds the scriptures, The most subtle and subtle; The sound of his discourse is pure.

source_sentence: 出柔軟音；　　教諸菩薩，　　無數億萬。
translation: It produces a gentle sound, Teaching countless millions of bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 梵音深妙，　　令人樂聞；　　各於世界，
translation: The sound of the holy Dharma is profound and subtle, Causing people to hear it gladly.

source_sentence: 講說正法。　　種種因緣，　　以無量喻；
translation: He teaches the true teaching for various reasons, using innumerable illustrations.

source_sentence: 照明佛法，　　開悟眾生。　　若人遭苦，
translation: He illuminates the Buddha’s teaching And enlightens sentient beings.

source_sentence: 厭老病死；　　為說涅槃，　　盡諸苦際。
translation: Being disillusioned with old age, illness, and death, he explains nirvāṇa in order to end the limits of suffering.

source_sentence: 若人有福，　　曾供養佛；　　志求勝法，
translation: If someone is blessed, they've offered support to the Buddha; those who aspire to the supreme Dharma,

source_sentence: 為說緣覺。　　若有佛子，　　修種種行；
translation: If there are any offspring of Buddha, They cultivate various practices.

source_sentence: 求無上慧，　　為說淨道。　　文殊師利！
translation: Seeking unexcelled wisdom, he teaches the pure path.

source_sentence: 我住於此；　　見聞若斯，　　及千億事，
translation: Here I dwell, seeing and hearing like this, And a thousand koṭis of these things.

source_sentence: 如是眾多，　　今當略說：　　我見彼土，
translation: Such are the many. I shall now briefly explain:

source_sentence: 恒沙菩薩，　　種種因緣，　　而求佛道；
translation: The enlightening beings of the sands of the Ganges Seek the path of buddhahood For various reasons.

source_sentence: 或有行施，　　金銀珊瑚、　　真珠摩尼、
translation: Some practice giving, gold, silver, coral, real pearls, and maṇi jewels.

source_sentence: 車璩馬瑙、　　金剛諸珍，　　奴婢車乘、
translation: Carriages, carriages, horse agate carts, A Forest of Pearls from the Dharma Garden, Volume I diamond treasures, slaves and maidservants’ chariots,

source_sentence: 寶飾輦輿、　　歡喜布施，　　迴向佛道；
translation: Jewel-adorned carriages, Joyfully giving gifts, They dedicate themselves to the path of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 願得是乘，　　三界第一，　　諸佛所歎。
translation: Wishing to attain this vehicle, which is the first in the three realms, the buddhas praise it.

source_sentence: 或有菩薩，　　駟馬寶車、　　欄楯華蓋、
translation: Or there may be bodhisattvas Who are riding on horses, chariots, jeweled carts, railings, and flower canopies.

source_sentence: 軒飾布施。　　復見菩薩，　　身肉手足，
translation: They also saw the bodhisattvas With their bodies, flesh, hands, and feet embellished with offerings.

source_sentence: 及妻子施，　　求無上道。　　又見菩薩，
translation: They give their wives and children, And seek the supreme path.

source_sentence: 頭目身體，　　欣樂施與，　　求佛智慧。
translation: Their heads, eyes, and bodies are delighted to give, seeking the Buddha's wisdom.

source_sentence: 文殊師利！　　我見諸王，　　往詣佛所，
translation: “O Mañjuśrī! I see the kings approaching the buddha.

source_sentence: 問無上道；　　便捨樂土，　　宮殿臣妾，
translation: When asked about the highest path, he abandoned the land of bliss and gave up his palace, ministers, concubines, and wives.

source_sentence: 剃除鬚髮，　　而被法服。　　或見菩薩，
translation: They shaved their hair and beards And donned the religious robes.

source_sentence: 而作比丘，　　獨處閑靜，　　樂誦經典。
translation: He becomes a monk, lives alone in seclusion, and enjoys reciting sūtras.

source_sentence: 又見菩薩，　　勇猛精進，　　入於深山，
translation: Furthermore, I see bodhisattvas Entering deep into the mountains With heroic efforts.

source_sentence: 思惟佛道。　　又見離欲，　　常處空閑，
translation: They contemplate the Buddha’s path And also see that they are free from desire, Always remaining in a lonely place.

source_sentence: 深修禪定，　　得五神通。　　又見菩薩，
translation: He deeply cultivates meditation and attains the five supernatural powers.

source_sentence: 安禪合掌，　　以千萬偈，　　讚諸法王。
translation: He joined his palms in meditation, praised the Dharma kings with a thousand verses.

source_sentence: 復見菩薩，　　智深志固，　　能問諸佛，
translation: Furthermore, I see bodhisattvas Whose knowledge is profound and their resolve firm. They can question the buddhas:

source_sentence: 聞悉受持。　　又見佛子，　　定慧具足，
translation: They hear, retain, And see the offspring of Buddha, Endowed with concentration and wisdom.

source_sentence: 以無量喻，　　為眾講法，　　欣樂說法，
translation: To teach the Dharma for all with boundless metaphors, They delight in teaching the Dharma.

source_sentence: 化諸菩薩，　　破魔兵眾，　　而擊法鼓。
translation: He transforms the bodhisattvas, destroys the armies of Māra, and strikes the Dharma drum.

source_sentence: 又見菩薩，　　寂然宴默，　　天龍恭敬，
translation: I also saw bodhisattvas Who were silent and in meditation, Respected by devas and nāgas.

source_sentence: 不以為喜。　　又見菩薩，　　處林放光，
translation: They also saw the bodhisattva In the forest, shining brightly.

source_sentence: 濟地獄苦，　　令入佛道。　　又見佛子，
translation: He saves beings from the suffering of hell And causes them to enter the buddha path.

source_sentence: 未甞睡眠，　　經行林中，　　勤求佛道。
translation: Before he sleeps, he walks through the forest and diligently pursues the Buddha Way.

source_sentence: 又見具戒，　　威儀無缺，　　淨如寶珠，
translation: He also observes the precepts And his manner is impeccably pure, Like a jeweled pearl.

source_sentence: 以求佛道。　　又見佛子，　　住忍辱力，
translation: Because they seek the path of buddhahood, They also see Buddha’s children Abiding in the power of forbearance.

source_sentence: 增上慢人，　　惡罵捶打，　　皆悉能忍，
translation: They can tolerate excessively arrogant people Being harmed, abused, and beaten.

source_sentence: 以求佛道。　　又見菩薩，　　離諸戲笑，
translation: In order to seek the buddha path, they also saw bodhisattvas Who were free of all kinds of frivolity and derision.

source_sentence: 及癡眷屬，　　親近智者，　　一心除亂，
translation: And the followers of delusion, who are intimate with wise people, singlemindedly rid themselves of confusion.

source_sentence: 攝念山林，　　億千萬歲，　　以求佛道。
translation: For hundreds of millions of myriads of koṭis of years I take care of the mountains and forests And seek the path of buddhahood.

source_sentence: 或見菩薩，　　餚饍飲食，　　百種湯藥，
translation: Or they may see enlightening beings Eating, drinking, and eating food, And a hundred kinds of medicines.

source_sentence: 施佛及僧；　　名衣上服，　　價直千萬，
translation: Giving to buddhas and saṃgha, famous robes and upper garments worth thousands of myriads of coins.

source_sentence: 或無價衣，　　施佛及僧；　　千萬億種，
translation: Some give priceless robes to the Buddha and the saṃgha, Thousands of koṭis of kinds.

source_sentence: 栴檀寶舍，　　眾妙臥具，　　施佛及僧；
translation: The sandalwood-jeweled monastery, with its many exquisite beddings, offered to the Buddha and the sangha.

source_sentence: 清淨園林，　　華果茂盛，　　流泉浴池，
translation: Pure gardens and forests, With abundant flowers and fruit, flowing water fountains and bathing ponds.

source_sentence: 施佛及僧；　　如是等施，　　種種微妙，
translation: Giving to buddhas and saṃgha, these kinds of gifts are various and subtle,

source_sentence: 歡喜無厭，　　求無上道。　　或有菩薩，
translation: Rejoicing without weariness, They seek the supreme path.

source_sentence: 說寂滅法，　　種種教詔，　　無數眾生；
translation: He teaches the Dharma of extinction, Various teachings and instructions, Innumerable sentient beings.

source_sentence: 又見菩薩，　　觀諸法性，　　無有一相，
translation: Furthermore, I see bodhisattvas Who perceive the essence of all things Without any single characteristic.

source_sentence: 猶如虛空；　　又見佛子，　　心無所著，
translation: They are like space, And yet they see the offspring of Buddha Who have no attachment in their minds:

source_sentence: 以此妙慧，　　求無上道。　　文殊師利！
translation: Because of this marvelous wisdom They seek the supreme path.

source_sentence: 又有菩薩，　　佛滅度後，　　供養舍利。
translation: There were also bodhisattvas who made offerings to the relics After the parinirvāṇa of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 又見佛子，　　造諸塔廟，　　無數恒沙，
translation: He also saw the Buddha’s heirs build many stupas, As numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River.

source_sentence: 嚴飾國界；　　寶塔高妙，　　五千由旬，
translation: A great jeweled stupa, five thousand yojanas in height, adorned the entire empire.

source_sentence: 縱廣正等，　　二千由旬；　　一一塔廟，
translation: Each tower was exactly one thousand yojanas long and wide, Two thousand yojanas in width.

source_sentence: 各千幢幡，　　珠交露縵，　　寶鈴和鳴；
translation: Each one thousand banners and pennants, interlaced with jewels, covered with draped railings, And sounding in harmony with precious bells.

source_sentence: 諸天龍神，　　人及非人，　　香華伎樂，
translation: The gods, dragons, spirits, humans and non-humans, fragrant flowers, music,

source_sentence: 常以供養。　　文殊師利！　　諸佛子等，
translation: “O Mañjuśrī, the heirs of the buddhas!

source_sentence: 為供舍利，　　嚴飾塔廟；　　國界自然，
translation: As an offering to the relics, they adorn stūpas and shrines; The boundaries of the land are naturally shaped like this.

source_sentence: 殊特妙好；　　如天樹王，　　其華開敷。
translation: It's extraordinarily beautiful, like the king of heavenly trees, whose flowers bloom.

source_sentence: 佛放一光，　　我及眾會，　　見此國界，
translation: The Buddha emitted a ray of light that illuminated all the assembled beings and I, together with myself, Became to see this world.

source_sentence: 種種殊妙。　　諸佛神力，　　智慧希有；
translation: They are various and marvelous, rare among the spiritual powers of buddhas.

source_sentence: 放一淨光，　　照無量國。　　我等見此，
translation: He emits a single ray of pure light, Illumining infinite lands.

source_sentence: 得未曾有。　　佛子文殊！　　願決眾疑，
translation: This is unprecedented, Mañjuśrī, the acquisition of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 四眾欣仰，　　瞻仁及我；　　世尊何故，
translation: The fourfold assembly was joyfully gazing at you and me. Why did the World-honored One...

source_sentence: 放斯光明？　　佛子時答，　　決疑令喜；
translation: The Buddha-child answered at the right time, Resolving his doubts and gladdening him.

source_sentence: 何所饒益，　　演斯光明？　　佛坐道場，
translation: What is the use of emitting this ray of light?

source_sentence: 所得妙法；　　為欲說此，　　為當授記？
translation: Why do you want to explain this wonderful teaching that you have attained, or will you give me assurance of its realization?

source_sentence: 示諸佛土，　　眾寶嚴淨；　　及見諸佛，
translation: They show the buddha-lands, The adornments of all jewels, And see the Buddhas.

source_sentence: 此非小緣。　　文殊當知！　　四眾龍神；
translation: You should know, Mañjuśrī, that these are not minor conditions.

source_sentence: 瞻察仁者，　　為說何等？」
translation: Look at you, my friend, and tell me what you say.

source_sentence: 於是彌勒菩薩，欲重宣此義，以偈問曰：是時文殊師利語彌勒菩薩摩訶薩及諸大士：「善男子等！
translation: When Maitreya wanted to reiterate this meaning, he asked in verse, Mañjuśrī then said to Maitreya the bodhisattva Mahāsattva and the great men, Good sons!

source_sentence: 如我惟忖，今佛世尊，欲說大法、雨大法雨、吹大法螺、擊大法鼓、演大法義。
translation: World-Honored Buddha, we now want to explain the great doctrine, rain down the great doctrine, blow the conch of the great doctrine, beat the drum of the great doctrine, and expound the meaning of the great doctrine.

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: “O sons of the virtuous!

source_sentence: 我於過去諸佛曾見此瑞，放斯光已即說大法。
translation: I've seen this vision in the past, and after emitting it, I'll explain the great teaching.

source_sentence: 是故當知，今佛現光亦復如是，欲令眾生咸得聞知一切世間難信之法，
translation: Because of this, you should know that the manifestation of Buddha’s light is also like this: wanting to enable sentient beings to hear and know all worldly unfaithful teachings.

source_sentence: 故現斯瑞。
translation: That's why this miraculous manifestation occurred.

source_sentence: 「諸善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 如過去無量無邊不可思議阿僧祇劫，爾時有佛，號日月燈明如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，
translation: “Furthermore, as in the past when there was a buddha named Candracchattrapradīpa Tathāgata, Arhat, Completely Enlightened, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Knower of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Devas and Humans, Buddha, Bhagavat.

source_sentence: 演說正法，初善、中善、後善，其義深遠其語巧妙，純一無雜，具足清白梵行之相。
translation: They expound the true teaching, which is good in the beginning, good in the middle, and good in the end. Their meaning is profound, their words are skillful, pure, unadulterated, and endowed with the characteristics of the pure practice of austerity.

source_sentence: 為求聲聞者，說應四諦法，度生、老、病、死，究竟涅槃；
translation: To those who seek to become śrāvakas he teaches the teaching of the four truths, thereby liberating them from birth, old age, illness, and death and enabling them to attain nirvana.

source_sentence: 為求辟支佛者，說應十二因緣法；
translation: To those who seek enlightenment they teach the teaching of the twelve principles of causality.

source_sentence: 為諸菩薩，說應六波羅蜜，令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，成一切種智。
translation: He teaches the six perfections for bodhisattvas so that they attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and become omniscience.

source_sentence: 次復有佛，亦名日月燈明；
translation: “Next there is another buddha, also called Candra moonlight of the sun and moon.

source_sentence: 次復有佛，亦名日月燈明；
translation: “Next there is another buddha, also called Candra moonlight of the sun and moon.

source_sentence: 如是二萬佛，皆同一字，號日月燈明，又同一姓，姓頗羅墮。
translation: Thus, these twenty thousand buddhas all had the same name, named Sun and Moon Lamplight, and the same family name, Bhāradvāja.

source_sentence: 「彌勒當知！
translation: You should know, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 初佛後佛皆同一字，名日月燈明，十號具足，所可說法初、中、後善。
translation: The first buddha and the second buddha are all one and the same word, which is called the sun, moon, and lamp of illumination, and the ten names are complete, so they can teach the Dharma that's good at the beginning, middle, and end.

source_sentence: 其最後佛未出家時，有八王子：一名有意，二名善意，三名無量意，四名寶意，
translation: The last buddha had eight princes before he renounced household life: the first was called manas, the second Sudarśana, the third immeasurable mind, and the fourth Ratnākara.

source_sentence: 五名增意，六名除疑意，七名響意，八名法意，是八王子，威德自在，
translation: The fifth is called the spirit of increasing zeal, the sixth the spirit of removing doubt, the seventh the spirit of reverence, and the eighth the spirit of enlightenment. These are the eight princes who have unimpeded sovereignty in terms of their mighty virtue.

source_sentence: 各領四天下。
translation: Each of them ruled over the four continents.

source_sentence: 是諸王子，聞父出家得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，悉捨王位亦隨出家，發大乘意常修梵行，
translation: Those princes, hearing that their father had renounced household life and attained highest, complete enlightenment, all relinquished their royal throne and also renounced household life. They aroused the aspiration for the Great Vehicle and always practiced the holy life.

source_sentence: 皆為法師，已於千萬佛所殖諸善本。
translation: They are all teachers of the Dharma, and they've planted good roots in the presence of thousands of buddhas.

source_sentence: 「是時日月燈明佛說大乘經，名《無量義教菩薩法佛所護念》；
translation: At that time the Buddha Candrasūryapradīpa was expounding a Mahayana scripture called Protected by Dharma Buddhas of Bodhisattvas of Immeasurable Meaning and Teaching.

source_sentence: 說是經已，即於大眾中結加趺坐，入於無量義處三昧，身心不動；
translation: Having taught this scripture, he sat cross-legged in the great assembly and entered concentration of immeasurable meanings, his body and mind unmoving.

source_sentence: 是時天雨曼陀羅華，摩訶曼陀羅華，曼殊沙華，摩訶曼殊沙華，而散佛上及諸大眾，
translation: Then the gods rained down heavenly flowers such as maṇḍala flowers, mahāmandārava flowers, mañjūṣaka flowers, and mahāmanjūṣaka flowers all scattered over the Buddha and the great assembly of monks.

source_sentence: 普佛世界六種震動。
translation: The world of the universal buddhas shakes in six ways.

source_sentence: 「爾時會中比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷、天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，
translation: At the time, there were monks, nuns, laymen, laymen, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and so forth in the assembly.

source_sentence: 及諸小王、轉輪聖王等，是諸大眾得未曾有，歡喜合掌一心觀佛。
translation: And the lesser kings, wheel-turning sage kings, and so forth, these masses attain an unprecedented experience, rejoicing as they join their palms and singlemindedly contemplate the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「爾時如來，放眉間白毫相光，照東方萬八千佛土，靡不周遍，如今所見是諸佛土。
translation: At the time, the Tathāgata radiated a ray of light from the white hair between his eyebrows that illuminated 18,000 buddha-lands in the east and pervaded them all, which are now seen as buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 「彌勒當知！
translation: You should know, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 爾時會中，有二十億菩薩，樂欲聽法，是諸菩薩，見此光明普照佛土，
translation: At that time there were twenty billion bodhisattvas in the assembly, delighted to hear the Dharma. These bodhisattvas saw this ray of light illumining all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 得未曾有，欲知此光所為因緣。
translation: They want to know the causes and conditions for what this light does.

source_sentence: 時有菩薩，名曰妙光，有八百弟子，是時日月燈明佛從三昧起，因妙光菩薩說大乘經，
translation: At that time there was an enlightening being called Marvelous Light, with eight hundred disciples. Then the buddha Candracchattra rose from his concentration and taught the Mahayana sutras to the enlightening being Marvelous Light.

source_sentence: 名《妙法蓮華教菩薩法佛所護念》，六十小劫不起于座；
translation: For sixty intermediate aeons it was called The Teaching of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma, Protected by the Enlightening being Universally Good.

source_sentence: 時會聽者，亦坐一處六十小劫身心不動，聽佛所說謂如食頃。
translation: The listeners of the assembly at that time also sat in one place for sixty intermediate kalpas without moving their bodies or minds, and when they heard what the Buddha taught them, it was as if they were eating.

source_sentence: 是時眾中，無有一人若身若心而生懈倦。
translation: At the time, there wasn't a single person in the crowd who became lazy with body or mind.

source_sentence: 「日月燈明佛，於六十小劫說是經已，即於梵魔沙門婆羅門及天人阿脩羅眾中，
translation: Having taught this sutra for sixty intermediate kalpas, the Buddha Candrasūryapradīpa explained it to the assembly of Brahmas, śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, brahmans, devas, humans, and asuras.

source_sentence: 而宣此言：『如來於今日中夜，當入無餘涅槃。』
translation: He proclaimed this, saying, 'Tonight, the Tathāgata will enter nirvāṇa without remainder today.'

source_sentence: 「時有菩薩，名曰德藏，日月燈明佛，即授其記告諸比丘：『是德藏菩薩，
translation: At that time there was an enlightening being named Virtuous Treasury, the sun and moon shining brightly. The Buddha Candracchattra gave him this prediction and said to the monks:

source_sentence: 次當作佛，號曰淨身多陀阿伽度、阿羅訶、三藐三佛陀。』
translation: Next, he'll become a buddha named Pure-body Tathāgata Agada, Arhat, and Samyak-saṃbuddha.'

source_sentence: 佛授記已，便於中夜入無餘涅槃。
translation: After the Buddha had given his prediction, he entered nirvāṇa without remainder in the middle of the night.

source_sentence: 「佛滅度後，妙光菩薩持《妙法蓮華經》，滿八十小劫，為人演說。
translation: “After the parinirvāṇa of the Buddha, Marvelous Light Bodhisattva preserved the Lotus Sutra of the Wonderful Dharma for eighty intermediate kalpas and taught it to people.

source_sentence: 日月燈明佛八子，皆師妙光，妙光教化，令其堅固阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；
translation: The eight children of the Buddha Candrasaṃyuktâgama-pradīpa were all teachers of subtle light. Subtle light taught and inspired them, enabling them to attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 是諸王子，供養無量百千萬億佛已，皆成佛道。
translation: After these princes had made offerings to measureless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of buddhas, they all became buddhas.

source_sentence: 其最後成佛者，名曰然燈，八百弟子，中有一人，號曰求名，貪著利養，
translation: The last to attain buddhahood was named Randana. Among the eight hundred disciples, there was one who sought fame and craved profit.

source_sentence: 雖復讀誦眾經，而不通利，多所忘失，故號求名，是人亦以種諸善根因緣故，
translation: Even though they read and recite scriptures, they do not penetrate the benefits of those teachings. They often forget what they have learned so that they are called śramaṇas seeking their names. Such people also plant roots of goodness through various causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 得值無量百千萬億諸佛，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚歎。
translation: They will be able to meet immeasurable hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of koṭis of buddhas and offer their support, veneration, reverence, veneration, and praise.

source_sentence: 「彌勒當知！
translation: You should know, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 爾時妙光菩薩，豈異人乎？
translation: At the time, isn't that a different person for the Bodhisattva Marvelous Light?

source_sentence: 我身是也。
translation: This is the self-body.

source_sentence: 求名菩薩，汝身是也。
